markdownRemark.html:
Minting a new entry

To mint a new entry in the register:

  • POST a new item in §11.2 JSON representation to the ..mint url.. with the proposed new entry number.
  • The item will first appear as a new item in the store
  • .. status codes and error cases
  • .. 202 Accepted with a Location header of the §3.2 Entry resource for the new entry
  • The proposer can only trust it has been secured when the entry is listed in the §5.2 Entries resource with the same §9.4 entry-number, and the §3.2 Entry resource is a covered by one or more §12 Digital Proofs for the register.

The item MUST NOT contain empty fields.
